Html:
Hi,

This worked great with bulk import as per the project title. Awesome.

Now I would like to set up a scheduler to obtain daily updates into the TermStore.  Tried doing full import every night but the fields (custom list) binded to this termstore looses connection during fresh import and left grayed out.  Would appreciate any feedback if someone found a way to get updates into the Managed Metadata. Thanks,

I looks like you need a service app that runs on a schedule. My app will not work in that scenario.

-p
